view.sqlSentence: SELECT CAST(CONCAT(YEAR(invoice.issue_date), "/", LPAD(MONTH(invoice.issue_date),2,"0")) AS CHAR), SUM(TRUNCATE(invoice_detail.taxable_base, 2)) FROM invoice_detail, invoice, registry, item, product WHERE product.id = item.product AND invoice_detail.item = item.id AND invoice_detail.invoice = invoice.id AND invoice.registry = registry.id AND item.id = ? AND registry.id = ? AND invoice.issue_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(?,"-",?,"-",1), "%Y-%m-%d"), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) AND DATE_SUB(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(?,"-",? + 1,"-",1), "%Y-%m-%d"), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND invoice.type = ? GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
